name: Reminder
body:
### Introduction
Reminder, beyond an image slideshow tool, has the following unique features:

1. can customize how the image is shown
2. automatically search and download images(*)
3. can embed the image with customized phrases

*: `api_key` and `cx` of google custom search is required

### System requirement
python2.7 or above

### Installation
1. Install `tkinter`  
**_linux_**  apt-get install python-tk 

2. Install `imageTk/PIL`  
_**linux**_  apt-get install python-imaging-tk  
_**osx**_  pip install Pillow

3. Download and extract the source and copy it into the desired directory.  
And have fun!

### Demo usage
1. ./main.py
2. ./main.py _config_image.ini_
3. ./main.py _config_phrase.ini_

In 1., how various image can be searched/downloaded/slide-showed is demonstrated.  
In 2., how the image will be shown by customized setting is demonstrated.  
In 3., how the image can be embedded with phrases is demonstrated.

### Motivation
We are creatures who can be mind-occupied by image and phrases. 
Hopefully, Reminder helps you determine how your precious memory space will be occupied.

### Reference
[Google Custom Search](https://developers.google.com/custom-search/)
